Question: Should (header, bid) messages be publicly accessible during the message passing period? https://github.com/flashbots/mev-boost/issues/112

A sealed-bid auction does seem superior, as it eliminates trying to outbid each other by marginal values. But this would mean including a signature for the getHeader call to give the Bid only to the validator proposing. cc/ <@543900561460822016> <@539495253418180618>
